dublin_core.dcvalue: This presentation covers successes and lessons learned from projects focused upon Proprietary and Patent Medicine Vendors PPMVs in Nigeria The first section led by Every1Mobile covers NaijaCare a program leveraging a new model for digital health a market based ecosystem within an online platform where PPMV owners are engaged to improve health outcomes The second will focus on Unilever s integration of corporate social responsibility into a triple bottom line through capacity building and improving the livelihoods of their community vendors including PPMVs The third section will be by a partner delivering a project also focused on delivering health outcomes through market based approaches and PPMVs Speakers include Richard Wright UnileverAbi Gleek Every1MobileTing Shih ClikMedixKrista Baptista MODERATOR DAI
Digital Solutions and Medical Vendors: Improving Health Outcomes through Market-Based Approaches
